channel.title: Jon Tajeda on mattischrome
channel.description: Recent content in Jon Tajeda on mattischrome

item.title: Album Digest, August 2011
item.description: I bought a collection of electronic music this month. I mixed them all up in a smart playlist on iTunes, the smart aspect being to limit to tracks that had been played fewer than five then six then seven times etc. This made sure I was still listening to all the tracks equally often, despite the randomness. Biosphere N-plants Ford & Lopatin Channel Pressure Gus Gus Arabian Horse Instra:Mental Resolution 653 Jon Tejada Parabolas Biosphere N-Plants I think this album makes Biosphere the most reviewed musician on this blog at the moment but I donâ€™t mind too much, he makes some great stuff.
